Context: The George Brown College School of Work and College Preparation offers smaller classrooms with built-in support from Pathway Advisors to help students achieve educational goals and explore career options. The learning environment has a strong international component, including opportunities for international fieldwork, international field trips, and academic pathways to various education institutions overseas. George Brown's curriculum benefits from many global partnerships. For more information, visit the website or sign up for updates using the contact details provided: 416-415-2000 (voice), TTY: 1-877-515-5559 (Telecommunications Device for the Deaf), ask.george@georgebrown.ca (email address). The information on the website is subject to change without notice. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
